title: Chania Call for a solidarity gathering in the Palestinian Resistance-Mazi struggle for the country's unblocking!
content:
Solidarity in Palestinian resistance

MASSIC PLAY FOR THE UNDERSTAND FROM THE WAR OF Imperialists

Everyone at the gathering, Saturday, February 24, 12 p. Market

The Palestinian genocide continues by the fascist-Zionist state of Israel with the full coverage of the US and European imperialists. The 30,000 are touched by the recorded dead! Thousands of injuries and an unknown number overwhelmed under the ruins! At the same time that hunger, thirst and illness reap those who escape the bombings, Israel is preparing to intervene with land forces in Rafa, where it has displaced over 1,000,000 Palestinian civilians, supposed to be "safe". The Nazi atrocities in repeat! At the same time, mass arrests, houses, murders, and the fierce blow to the demonstrations await the Palestinians in the western "Massively resist and express their opposition to the raid on Gaza.

At the same time as the war in Ukraine counts hundreds of thousands of dead and millions of refugees, the nuclear trap is mounted above Europe, The imperialists will not hesitate to open another regional war if it serves their interests! The US and Great Britain are bombarding Yemen's cities by escalating the conflict in the region. Close up is the European Union that sends warships to the Red Sea under the pseudonym ASPIDES in order to have a say in any "sharing". The mission's business center will be in Larissa while already In the port of Souda there is German frigate and the rest of the warships are expected.

In the face of this dangerous situation for peoples, the ND government, and the system parties say they are willing to stand in the interests of the imperialists. They are politically and militarily supported by Israel's fascist-Zionist state in the crime he commits against the Palestinian people. The country has been transformed into an advanced US-NATO prison, on a vast basis for the sake of their deadly weapons from Souda to Alexandroupolis. The government is escalating the country's involvement in the war by sending the frigate "Hydra" to the Red Sea and taking over the administration of the frigates that will be sent there. He has already stated that he will participate with another frigate in US -UK war operations. The country's unmistakable bourgeoisie of the country to "satisfy" its Motoropathies drags the people and the country on dangerous roads. It scatters billions in equipment programs, while it reserves for workers, youth, the people as a whole, poverty, poverty and life without rights.

The need to strengthen the anti -war anti -imperialist movement in our country is imperative and to stop the country's involvement in the war. This is also the real solidarity in the right of the Palestinian people for a white and independent homeland!

  • NO EMPLOYEES OF THE COUNTRY!
  • NO IN FRAGA SHIPPING TO ERYTHYTH SAINT!
  • Outside the bases of death from our place. Outside US-NATO and EU!
  • Lefter in Palestinian!

Chania, 21-02-2024

Resistance Initiative
author: protovant
